locations.description: Along the far-reaching stretch of Grand Strand coastline, Myrtle Beach State Park sits nestled among oceanfront maritime forest. A quiet, and surprisingly green, escape from the otherwise bustling beach, the park provides educational opportunities, a nature trail and some of the best surf fishing South Carolina has to offer as well as stunning ocean views and another great fishing spot on Myrtle Beach pier.
Brittlebank Park is a ten-acre park located between Lockwood Boulevard and the Ashley River in Charleston, South Carolina near Gadsden Creek

locations.location: North Myrtle Beach Park and Sports Complex
locations.description: Pine-shaded recreation area offering baseball & soccer fields for kids & college-level players.  Nearby is Go Ape treeline Adventure.  There are also wlking trails and water activities.
